name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: If developers are so concerned about "containers" and "local development" then... They're starting in completely the wrong place. Which comes back to the original tweet: I have the experience. Being told I can't say that to a tech person is infuriating.
content.value:
If developers are so concerned about "containers" and "local development" then... They're starting in completely the wrong place.

Which comes back to the original tweet:

I have the experience.

Being told I can't say that to a tech person is infuriating.
